responseText: Success, of a fashion! By inscribing a containment matrix of Ignis-Vald around the forge's intake vents, and using precisely attuned Sunstone Shards as a focal lens, I can draw forth lesser Magma or Coal Elementals. The 'Frozen Assembly' of gems I prepared is key to this. The challenge remains in binding them to sustained service without them consuming the enchantments or breaking free...
name: ANV_FTUE_0011_VarnoksJournal_3_Response
